p: The eltrombopag IC 50s ranged from 99 nM (U1 in HFFs) to 4331 nM (Hi91 in ASCs) ( Figure 5A, Table S3). When compared across the two cell types, the different HCMV strains and clinical isolates displayed similar eltrombopag sensitivity, apart from U1, which appeared to be particularly sensitive to eltrombopag in HFFs and ASCs ( Figure 5A). The average HCMV sensitivity to eltrombopag was very similar in both cell types.
